summary.text: An array of serialised data objects, each of which is the data for a page in the documentation frontend.

summary.text:
Ladies and Gents, hang onto your purses and wallets caus' the fixer is gonna fix your
standard typeDoc JSON into a super recursive frontend object!!

The standard TypeDoc JSON signature output gets named as "__type".

This function serialises the signature into the YAF frontend format with the corrected name.

text.comment:
The standard TypeDoc JSON signature output gets named as "__type".

This function serialises the signature into the YAF frontend format with the corrected name.

Returns:

summary.text: The standard Typedoc data structure creates a container object
`Reflection.type.declaration`

to house reflection recursion.\
This breaks the pattern which would otherwise be
`Reflection.children[]`

.

This function bridges the break and passes down some properties from the parent to the frontend data structure.

content.text:
Void. Because there are a few different mappings to parse on the parent objects properties, this function
mutates the object instead of returning a new value.

summary.text: The YafDataObject at the current point of recursion

text.comment: The YafDataObject at the current point of recursion

summary.text: The TypeDoc reflection corresponding to the
`object`

text.comment: The TypeDoc reflection corresponding to the object

summary.text: The page parent Typedoc reflection (ie. the first ancestor on any given document page)

text.comment: The page parent Typedoc reflection (ie. the first ancestor on any given document page)

The standard Typedoc data structure creates a container object Reflection.type.declaration to house reflection recursion.
This breaks the pattern which would otherwise be Reflection.children[].

This function bridges the break and passes down some properties from the parent to the frontend data structure.

Returns:

Void. Because there are a few different mappings to parse on the parent objects properties, this function mutates the object instead of returning a new value.

summary.text: Typedoc has already created groupings in the JSON output, before
fixObjectCallKind

has done it's job.

This function re-maps the groupings for this correction by moving method reflections from the
`Properties`
group into the
`Methods`
group.

content.text: Void. The child property is mutated.

text.comment:
Typedoc has already created groupings in the JSON output, before fixObjectCallKind has done it's job.

This function re-maps the groupings for this correction by moving method reflections from the Properties group into the Methods group.

Returns:

Void. The child property is mutated.

summary.text: Finds missing parameter links and fills in the target id.

text.comment:
Finds missing parameter links and fills in the target id.

Returns:

summary.text:
The TypeDoc serialiser cannot track the id's of reflections across workspace packages in
a [monorepo](https://typedoc.org/guides/monorepo/) entryPoint strategy.

The result is that documentation cross linkages for parameter types are lost.

This method examines the type reflection and adds a reference to the file context, which identifies the package.\
`typedoc-theme-yaf`
can the forensically find the target id when it later parses the links.

text.comment:
The TypeDoc serialiser cannot track the id's of reflections across workspace packages in a monorepo entryPoint strategy.

The result is that documentation cross linkages for parameter types are lost.

This method examines the type reflection and adds a reference to the file context, which identifies the package.
typedoc-theme-yaf can the forensically find the target id when it later parses the links.

summary.text: The default TypeDoc declaration Reflection gets a
`Property`

kind, regardless if it has a call signature.

This function fixes the frontend data to be the correct kind.

text.comment:
The default TypeDoc declaration Reflection gets a Property kind, regardless if it has a call signature.

This function fixes the frontend data to be the correct kind.

Returns:
Ladies and Gents, hang onto your purses and wallets caus' the fixer is gonna fix your standard typeDoc JSON into a super recursive frontend object!!
